Label: Edition version number
Description: The number of a numbered revision within an edition number. To be used only where a publisher uses such two-level numbering to indicate revisions which do not constitute a new edition under a new ISBN or other distinctive product identifier. Optional and non-repeating. If this field is used, an <EditionNumber> must also be present.
Format: <dd>Variable length text, suggested maximum length 50 characters</dd>
